title: Analysis
description: Used for the identification or quantitative determination of a substance or its constituents and metabolites; includes the analysis of air, water, or other environmental carrier. It excludes the chemical analysis of tissues, tumors, body fluids, organisms, and plants for which "chemistry" is used. The concept applies to both methodology and results. For analysis of substances in blood, cerebrospinal fluid, and urine the specific subheading designating the fluid is used.
sub_qualifiers: - Blood - Cerebrospinal Fluid - Isolation & Purification - Urine
prompt:
### Analysis
* Code: 00
* Description: Used for the identification or quantitative determination of a substance or its constituents and metabolites; includes the analysis of air, water, or other environmental carrier. It excludes the chemical analysis of tissues, tumors, body fluids, organisms, and plants for which "chemistry" is used. The concept applies to both methodology and results. For analysis of substances in blood, cerebrospinal fluid, and urine the specific subheading designating the fluid is used.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Blood - Cerebrospinal Fluid - Isolation & Purification - Urine

title: Anatomy & Histology
description: Used with organs, regions, and tissues for normal descriptive anatomy and histology, and for the normal anatomy and structure of animals and plants.
sub_qualifiers: - Blood Supply - Cytology - Ultrastructure - Embryology - Abnormalities - Innervation - Pathology
prompt:
### Anatomy & Histology
* Code: 01
* Description: Used with organs, regions, and tissues for normal descriptive anatomy and histology, and for the normal anatomy and structure of animals and plants.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Blood Supply - Cytology - Ultrastructure - Embryology - Abnormalities - Innervation - Pathology

title: Chemistry
description: Used with chemicals, biological, and non-biological substances for their composition, structure, characterization, and properties; also used for the chemical composition or content of organs, tissue, tumors, body fluids, organisms, and plants. Excludes chemical analysis and determination of substances for which "analysis" is used; excludes synthesis for which "chemical synthesis" is used; excludes isolation and purification of substances for which "isolation & purification" is used.
sub_qualifiers: - Agonists - Analogs & Derivatives - Antagonists & Inhibitors - Chemical Synthesis
prompt:
### Chemistry
* Code: 02
* Description: Used with chemicals, biological, and non-biological substances for their composition, structure, characterization, and properties; also used for the chemical composition or content of organs, tissue, tumors, body fluids, organisms, and plants. Excludes chemical analysis and determination of substances for which "analysis" is used; excludes synthesis for which "chemical synthesis" is used; excludes isolation and purification of substances for which "isolation & purification" is used.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Agonists - Analogs & Derivatives - Antagonists & Inhibitors - Chemical Synthesis

title: Diagnosis
description: Used with diseases for all aspects of diagnosis, including examination, differential diagnosis and prognosis. Excludes diagnosis using imaging techniques (e.g. radiography, scintigraphy, and ultrasonography) for which "diagnostic imaging" is used.
prompt:
### Diagnosis
* Code: 03
* Description: Used with diseases for all aspects of diagnosis, including examination, differential diagnosis and prognosis. Excludes diagnosis using imaging techniques (e.g. radiography, scintigraphy, and ultrasonography) for which "diagnostic imaging" is used.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Diagnostic Imaging

title: Etiology
description: Used with diseases for causative agents including microorganisms and includes environmental and social factors and personal habits as contributing factors. It includes pathogenesis.
sub_qualifiers: - Chemically Induced - Complications - Secondary - Congenital - Embryology - Genetics - Immunology - Microbiology - Virology - Parasitology - Transmission
prompt:
### Etiology
* Code: 04
* Description: Used with diseases for causative agents including microorganisms and includes environmental and social factors and personal habits as contributing factors. It includes pathogenesis.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Chemically Induced - Complications - Secondary - Congenital - Embryology - Genetics - Immunology - Microbiology - Virology - Parasitology - Transmission

title: Organization & Administration
description: Used for administrative structure and management.
prompt:
### Organization & Administration
* Code: 05
* Description: Used for administrative structure and management.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Economics - Legislation & Jurisprudence

title: Standards
description: Used with facilities, personnel, and program headings for the development, testing, and application of standards of adequacy or acceptable performance and with chemicals and drugs for standards of identification, quality, and potency. It includes health or safety standards in industries and occupations.
prompt:
### Standards
* Code: 06
* Description: Used with facilities, personnel, and program headings for the development, testing, and application of standards of adequacy or acceptable performance and with chemicals and drugs for standards of identification, quality, and potency. It includes health or safety standards in industries and occupations.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
  - Null

title: Supply & Distribution
description: Used for the quantitative availability and distribution of material, equipment, health services, personnel, and facilities. It excludes food supply and water supply in industries and occupations.
prompt:
### Supply & Distribution
* Code: 07
* Description: Used for the quantitative availability and distribution of material, equipment, health services, personnel, and facilities. It excludes food supply and water supply in industries and occupations.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
  - Null

title: Trends
description: Used for the manner in which a subject changes, qualitatively or quantitatively, with time, whether past, present, or future. It excludes discussions of the course of disease in particular patients.
prompt:
### Trends
* Code: 08
* Description: Used for the manner in which a subject changes, qualitatively or quantitatively, with time, whether past, present, or future. It excludes discussions of the course of disease in particular patients.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
  - Null

title: Pharmacology
description: Used with drugs and exogenously administered chemical substances for their effects on living tissues and organisms. It includes acceleration and inhibition of physiological and biochemical processes and other pharmacologic mechanisms of action.
sub_qualifiers: - Adminstration & Dosage - Adverse Effects - Poisoning - Toxicity - Agonists - Antagonists & Inhibitors - Pharmacokinetics
prompt:
### Pharmacology
* Code: 09
* Description: Used with drugs and exogenously administered chemical substances for their effects on living tissues and organisms. It includes acceleration and inhibition of physiological and biochemical processes and other pharmacologic mechanisms of action.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Adminstration & Dosage - Adverse Effects - Poisoning - Toxicity - Agonists - Antagonists & Inhibitors - Pharmacokinetics

title: Physiology
description: Used with organs, tissues, and cells of unicellular and multicellular organisms for normal function. It is used also with biochemical substances, endogenously produced, for their physiologic role.
sub_qualifiers: - Genetics - Growth & Development - Immunology - Metabolism - Biosynthesis - Blood - Cerebrospinal Fluid - Deficiency - Enzymology - Pharmacokinetics - Urine - Physiopathology
prompt:
### Physiology
* Code: 10
* Description: Used with organs, tissues, and cells of unicellular and multicellular organisms for normal function. It is used also with biochemical substances, endogenously produced, for their physiologic role.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Genetics - Growth & Development - Immunology - Metabolism - Biosynthesis - Blood - Cerebrospinal Fluid - Deficiency - Enzymology - Pharmacokinetics - Urine - Physiopathology

title: Statistics & Numerical Data
description: Used with non-disease headings for the expression of numerical values which describe particular sets or groups of data. It excludes demand for which "supply & distribution" is used.
prompt:
### Statistics & Numerical Data
* Code: 11
* Description: Used with non-disease headings for the expression of numerical values which describe particular sets or groups of data. It excludes demand for which "supply & distribution" is used.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Epidemiology - Ethnology - Mortality - Supply & Distribution

title: Therapeutic Use
description: Used with drugs, biological preparations, and physical agents for their use in the prophylaxis and treatment of disease. It includes veterinary use.
prompt:
### Therapeutic Use
* Code: 12
* Description: Used with drugs, biological preparations, and physical agents for their use in the prophylaxis and treatment of disease. It includes veterinary use.
* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Administration & Dosage - Adverse Effects - Poisoning

title: Therapy
description: Used with diseases for therapeutic interventions except drug therapy, diet therapy, radiotherapy, and surgery, for which specific subheadings exist. The concept is also used for articles and books dealing with multiple therapies.
sub_qualifiers: - Diet Therapy - Drug Therapy - Nursing - Prevention & Control - Radiotherapy - Rehabilitation - Surgery - Transplantation
prompt:
### Therapy
* Code: 13

* Sub Qualifiers Hiearchy:
- Diet Therapy - Drug Therapy - Nursing - Prevention & Control - Radiotherapy - Rehabilitation - Surgery - Transplantation

title: Psychology
description: Used with non-psychiatric diseases, techniques, and named groups for psychologic, psychiatric, psychosomatic, psychosocial, behavioral, and emotional aspects, and with psychiatric disease for psychologic aspects; used also with animal terms for animal behavior and psychology.

### Psychology

  - Null

title: Radiation Effects
description: Used for effects of ionizing and nonionizing radiation upon living organisms, organs and tissues, and their constituents, and upon physiologic processes. It includes the effect of irradiation on drugs and chemicals.
